column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The food quality had to be split between the meat and the broth. The meat was tender and had the consistency that encouraged the desire to order seconds but since the noodles were served in plentiful portion
column2: there was no room after the first bowl. The broth from the Jinya Tonkotsu Black was changed since the last time it was tasted and needed more salt
column4: and gyoza sauce to allow the flavor to surface.
